summary: A projectionist bored with his everyday life begins fantasizing about his being one of the superheroes he sees in the movies he shows.
cast: Chuck McCann|Ina Balin|Rodney Dangerfield|Jára Kohout|Harry Hurwitz|Mike Gentry|Lucky Kargo|David Holliday|Sam Stewart|Alex Stevens|Robert Lee|Stephen Philips|Morocco|Clara Rosenthal|Jacqueline Glenn|Robert Staats|Robert King|Rita Bennett|João Fernandes
title: The Projectionist
